dict.acceptation: 在…下面，在表面之下；在…的假定表面或掩饰下；少于，小于；在…情况下；
在下面；少于；在水下；在昏迷中；

sent.orig: The 1980s geometrical logos have come back in fullforce tocontradict minimalism, under-design, and common sensesimplicity.
sent.trans: 20世纪80年代的几何图案标志的回归正在全力反击极简主义，under-design,和简单常识。

sent.orig: As soon as under touches, the young fellow looked ashen- -under already is immediately stiff!
sent.trans: 一触之下，小伙子顿时面如土色——手下已是僵硬的了！

sent.orig: Under federal law, the lands under navigable waters belong to states.
sent.trans: 根据联邦法律，适于航行水域下面的土地属于国家。

sent.orig: So he did the tiller under his and the sheet of the sail under his foot.
sent.trans: 窝里挟着舵柄，一只脚踩住了帆脚索，就这样办了。

sent.orig: I live under my own steam, and nobody took me under his wing.
sent.trans: 我自食其力地生活，没人保护过我。
